title: Analyze Market
subtitle: Enter a Zip Code or Address
description: Instantly pull a detailed analysis for any US zip code, including rent averages, historical trends, and property type composition.
label: Run Analysis

title: Chat with Data
subtitle: Ask Questions in Plain English
description: Instead of just viewing charts, ask our AI specific questions about the market data, like 'What are the average rents for 3-bedroom houses?'
label: AI Chat Interface

title: Generate Report
subtitle: Create Branded Reports
description: With one click, generate a professional PDF or online report with your company's branding to share with clients or partners.
label: Export Report

title: Arm Your Agents
subtitle: Feed Insights to Your AI Team
description: Pass the market analysis to your AI Sales Agents. They will intelligently weave these stats into their conversations to build authority and create compelling arguments.
label: Empower AI Agents
